Literature.Title: Synthesis and Structure-Activity Relationship Studies of N-terminal Analogues of the Antimicrobial Peptide Tridecaptin A(1)
Literature.Author: Cochrane SA, Lohans CT, Brandelli JR, Mulvey G, Armstrong GD, Vederas JC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=50µg/ml),Campylobacter jejuni NCTC 11168(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>100µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 15313(MIC=50µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=>100µg/ml)
